thread.title: Week 8 picks: See staff predictions for 15 area high school football matchups 2015
thread.title_full: Week 8 picks: See staff predictions for 15 area high school football matchups 2015 | cleveland.com

author: Joe Noga, Northeast Ohio Media Group
title: Week 8 picks: See staff predictions for 15 area high school football matchups 2015
text:
CLEVELAND, Ohio -- Here are staff predictions from the Northeast Ohio Media Group on 15 area Week 8 high school football games.
Reporter Nate Cline went 15-0 in Week 7 and wrestled the lead away from High School Sports Manager Kristen Davis, who had been on to since Week 1.
Wins by Cleveland Heights and Copley helped boost Cline to an unbeaten week.
This week the staff has picked unanimous winners in nine of 15 games, including Euclid, Bay, Holy Name and Solon. The staff also favors Villa Angela-St. Joseph against Trinity 4-3, and Buchtel against Ellet 4-3.
Log into the comments section below the grid and tell us which staff member made the right picks.
Note: You may need to scroll to the right part of the grid to see all 8 picks.
